resources.name: üìã Public Queries
resources.description: Public GraphQL queries that don't require authentication

resources.name: üîç Advanced Search
resources.description: Advanced product search with fuzzy matching

body.text:
{
  "query": "query GetDefaultShoppingList {
    myDefaultShoppingList {
      id
      name
      description
      isDefault
      itemCount
      completedItemCount
      estimatedTotalPrice
      completionPercentage
      items(first: 50) {
        totalCount
        edges {
          node {
            id
            description
            normalizedDescription
            notes
            quantity
            unit
            unitType
            isChecked
            checkedAt
            sortOrder
            estimatedPrice
            actualPrice
            totalEstimatedPrice
            totalActualPrice
            priceSource
            category
            tags
            isLinked
            availabilityStatus
            matchingConfidence
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            linkedProduct {
              id
              name
              brand
              currentPrice
              imageURL
              store {
                name
                code
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }"
}

{
  "query": "query GetMyPriceAlerts {
    myPriceAlerts {
      id
      alertType
      targetPrice
      dropPercent
      isActive
      notifyEmail
      notifyPush
      lastTriggered
      triggerCount
      lastPrice
      notes
      createdAt
      expiresAt
      isActiveAlert
      product {
        id
        name
        brand
        category
        currentPrice
        imageURL
      }
      store {
        id
        code
        name
        logoURL
      }
    }
  }"
}
